mapper.select: select id, qTitle, aTitle, description, UseYn, DATE_FORMAT(CreatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') CreatedAt, DATE_FORMAT(UpdatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') UpdatedAt from faq where UseYn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into faq (qTitle, aTitle, description) values(#{qTitle}, #{aTitle}, #{description});
mapper.update: update faq set UseYn = 'N' where id = #{id}
